actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a retirement savings deduction for persons covered by certain pension plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from the gross income of an employee for cash contributions made for his benefit to: (1) a qualified pension, profit sharing, or stock bonus plan; (2) a qualified annuity plan; (3) a qualified bond purchase plan; or (4) an individual retirement account. Limits such deduction to ten percent of the employee's compensation for the taxable year or $1,000, whichever is less.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a retirement savings deduction for persons covered by certain pension plans.
